If you think the series as a netori and Shinohara as the mc getting the teacher to fully accept his love, this will be digested better. After reading all this shit I came to a conclusion that if the teacher accepter Shinohara way back in #343605 (This story), none of the later chapters would've happened. But what happened? She was still obsessed with Jun cause he was her fIrSt LoVe. She didn't fully accepted Shinohara so a LOT of shit happened and Shinohara tried his best to break her. He finally manages to do it (The bet in #84157 at the end). As he was angry he forced (As her mind was broken she kind of just went with the flow) gangbang her for a year. She returned and reunited again with Jun. Shinohara went after her again and rebroke her (She couldn't go back after all the events, The evidence in #283883 shows she went nuts). After seeing Jun go away she couldn't hold on to the false hope of having Jun back. Shinohara used various stuff to make his dick perfect for the teacher. For me this was more netori than netorare and Shinohara was the real mc.
